sentences.english: Thick skin, large pores, acne and acne jumbled.
sentences.chinese: 膚質較厚，毛孔粗大，冗雜長粉刺和麪皰。

sentences.english: Do you worry abot acne on your face?
sentences.chinese: 你擔憂你臉上的粉刺嗎？

sentences.english: Concomitant use with other acne clear series will better the effect.
sentences.chinese: 與其他粉刺淨顏系列產品搭配使用，效果更佳。

sentences.english: If you tend to get pimples, make it a habit to drink the water of a fresh coconut every day.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想得粉刺，那就每天喝新鮮的可可水吧。

sentences.english: I also have occasional breakouts and blackheads all over my face.
sentences.chinese: 而且經常季節性的全臉爆發粉刺和黑頭。

sentences.english: Drugs from the tetracycline family are the most commonly prescribed antibiotics for the treatment of severe acne.
sentences.chinese: 治療嚴重粉刺最常用的是四環素類抗生素。

sentences.english: Often it can be used for severe acne treatment.
sentences.chinese: 通常它被用於治療重度粉刺。

sentences.english: Minds, like bodies, will often fall into a pimpled, ill-conditioned state from mere excess of comfort.
sentences.chinese: 思想和身體一樣，過於舒適就會經常長粉刺。

sentences.english: Aha! He did have some scars from acne that potholed his cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 啊哈，他的面頰上確有些粉刺留下的坑窪痕跡。

sentences.english: Help keep skin clear of new acne pimples.
sentences.chinese: 幫助保持皮膚暗瘡粉刺的新明確。

sentences.english: Remember, everything is good in moderation, thus overexfoliation can result in intensifying oil production that leading to breakouts and acne.
sentences.chinese: 過分的去角質會導致缺水出油，從而產生丘疹和粉刺。

sentences.english: What is the best acne cleanser for body acne and oily skin?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是身體粉刺和油膩的皮膚的最佳的粉刺清潔劑？

sentences.english: What is the best acne cleanser for body acne and oily skin?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是身體粉刺和油膩的皮膚的最佳的粉刺清潔劑？

sentences.english: You can apply aloe vera gel on the acne.
sentences.chinese: 你可以把蘆薈塗抹在粉刺上面。

sentences.english: Most mineral cosmetic brands are non-acnegenic, which means they won’t irritate acne-prone skin.
sentences.chinese: 意味着他們不會刺激易於生粉刺的皮膚。

sentences.english: Proper use of acne-see stubborn angle plug without leaving any traces.
sentences.chinese: 正確使用粉刺針，才能清楚固執角栓不留痕跡。

definition: rosacea (dermatological condition of the face and nose)/brandy nose
